prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with elegant features and a serene expression.
I want a fighting-type Pokemon that has a graceful pose and vibrant colors.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon with a unique mix of pink and white shades.
Make a Pokemon that balances physical strength with psychic abilities, showcasing both traits.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies calmness and focus, with a serene appearance.
Design a creature that represents both psychic and fighting powers in a stylish way.
Show me a Pokemon that blends elegance with martial arts prowess in its design.
